touchpoints.name: Front-end
touchpoints.description: I deliver performant, maintainable, and scalable front-end code through the use of custom-made pattern libraries, well-structured CSS, and robust tooling. This helps drive consistency, predictability, and rapid prototyping when working on a large project.

touchpoints.name: Back-end
touchpoints.description: I have many years of experience with content management systems such as WordPress, Craft CMS, and ExpressionEngine. I create project-specific WordPress plugins, and applications with Laravel. I use Netlify, Heroku, and DigitalOcean for deploying projects.

touchpoints.name: JavaScript
touchpoints.description: I build applications with Vue.js and React. Coupled with my skills in front-end and back-end, I produce quality software with clean & maintainable code. I value accessibility, and supply fallbacks where possible to deliver a usable experience no matter the device.
